channel.title: Why is RSCPS Dead?
channel.description:
VPS are too expensive? VPS are hard to use? VPS are shit? Don't know how to set up a server? Don't know how to code? Don't know what the fuck you are doing?
At Cheap-VPS.Sytes.Net, we offer very cheap VPS but very good servers, starting from $5, with both Operating Systems Linux & Windows, we will also do all the administrative work for you for absolutely free (if you want us to), so if you want to run a RS Server, and don't know anything about how to, we will do it all for you.
Every week a registered member gets randomly selected for a free 1024MB RAM Windows/Linux VPS. (So why not go and register for you chance to win a free Linux/Windows VPS?)
How am I doing this? because I made £5000 from a scratch card so I have enough money atm to do this.
Why am I doing this? Because Im rich bitch. On a serious note, to try and save the RSCPS scene.
We offer Operating Systems: Linux CentOS V5 Windows Server 2003 x32-bit Windows Server 2008 x64-bit/x86-bit
RSCPS are close to dead, even unedited shitty servers will save the RSC Scene, so make a change now!
Peace.

item.title: Why is RSCPS Dead?
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

Sounds like a cheap VPS company that I prepaid with for a number of months and then they up and vanished.

Not interested anyway, I’m done trying to run popular RSCPS servers when the only result is being DDoS’d and wasting money. DDoSing killed RSCPS.

Read full topic

item.title: Why is RSCPS Dead?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“vash2341, post:5, topic:317378”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=413913.msg3047780#msg3047780 date=1259885352]

Thanks vash.
I am also going to let someone I trust to test out these servers for free, the Windows Server 2008 x64-bit and the Linux CentOS V5, probably someone like xEnt/Peeter if they want to.
[/quote]i’m sure i speak on behalf of Peeter when i say, no thanks.

nice job on the winnings, but i don’t think saving the RSC server scene means offering 5$ fully set up servers…

its a better idea then anyone i have heard. actually its the only idea i have heard cause everyone else is basically sitting back and letting it die.[/quote]its the people that make funservers that last a week thats killing the RSC scene, players are limited in this RSC scene and when a player plays a crappy server and the server ends, the player thinks the rest will be like that and leaves. 5$ servers won’t be helping it unfortunately, sure its a nice idea but it doesn’t actually help anything except the people running the server

Read full topic

VPS are too expensive?
